Text: To anybody who is having sound issues download a different version of the patch (cnet version worked fine for me after having no sound options in the game :D).
go to gamecopyworld (google it) for a working crack. Also you should change the installation directory manually to C:\Program Files\Eidos Interactive. Good luck
